text: They're Calling, Open the Door () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Alexander Mitta.Судьба Буратино и Красной Шапочки. Кем стали дети-актеры из СССРЗВОНЯТ, ОТКРОЙТЕ ДВЕРЬ (1965) It stars Elena Proklova, Rolan Bykov, and Sergey Nikonenko. ==Actors== * Elena Proklova as Tanya Nechaeva * Rolan Bykov as Pavel Vasilievich Kolpakov * Sergey Nikonenko as Petya Kryuchkov * Vladimir Belokurov as violinist Korkin * Viktor Kosykh as Genka * Valentina Vladimirova as watchman in theater == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1965 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: They're Calling, Open the Door
